title: In a Lonely Place - Update
description: When California entrepreneur Chris Smith is murdered, his family is shocked. They had believed he had sold his company, broken up with this girlfriend and was traveling the world with a Playboy Playmate. In a December 6, 2019 update, the man convicted of his murder speaks with Keith Morrison.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
